item.title: Resume
item.description: Experience # Teaching Assistant, University of Queensland, Feb 2022 — Present 2025 Semester 1: CSSE2310, CSSE3100, STAT2003 2024 Semester 2: CSSE2310, MATH2504, STAT3006 2024 Semester 1: CSSE2310, CSSE3100, STAT2003 2023 Semester 2: CSSE1001, CSSE2310, MATH2504 2023 Semester 1: CSSE1001, CSSE2310, STAT1201 2022 Semester 2: CSSE1001 2022 Semester 1: CSSE1001 Software Engineer Intern, Atlassian, Nov 2024 — Feb 2025 Data Analytics Intern, Auto & General, Jun 2023 — Jul 2024 Innovation Intern, Fugro, Nov 2022 — Feb 2023 Pricing Intern, Auto & General, Nov 2021 — Nov 2022 Education # Bachelor of Mathematics (Honours), University of Queensland, 2025 — Present Bachelor of Mathematics in Statistics, University of Queensland, 2021 — 2024 Bachelor of Computer Science, University of Queensland, 2021 — 2024 Queensland Certificate of Education, Brisbane Grammar School, 2015 — 2020 Extracurricular # Secretary, UQ Computing Society, 2022 & 2023 Industry Liaison Officer, UQ Mathematics Student Society, 2023
